All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AppDriver
Main driver class of the program.
Appliance
Abstract Appliance super-class that is extended by the specific appliance types of Modern Appliances.
Dishwasher
Dishwasher class extends Appliance and implements its own unique attributes and methods.
Door
Enumerates the valid number of doors in key value pairs for the Refrigerator class
Microwave
Microwave class extends Appliance and implements its own unique attributes and methods.
Refrigerator
Refrigerator class extends Appliance and implements its own unique attributes and methods.
Room
Enumerates the valid room types for the Microwave class
Sound
Enumerates the valid sound ratings for the Dishwasher class
Vacuum
Vacuum class extends Appliance and implements its own unique attributes and methods.
Voltage
Enumerates the valid battery voltages in key value pairs for the Vacuum class
